title: Custom Dual Squelcher
paragraphs: The Custom Dual Squelcher is a main weapon in Splatoon. It is a Custom-branded version of the Dual Squelcher. Just like its main counterpart in Splatoon 2, it was reworked into the Custom Dualie Squelchers.

The Custom Dual Squelcher is nearly identical in appearance to the Dual Squelcher. The only difference between the two is that the Custom Dual Squelcher has a sticker bearing the Custom logo on the bottom part of the gun.
The Custom Dual Squelcher was released on 27 June 2015 at 02:00 UTC.[1] It comes as a set with Squid Beakons and the Killer Wail.
- An Inkling displaying the equipped Custom Dual Squelcher in standing position.
- A jumping shot with the Custom Dual Squelcher.
- Showing the range of the Custom Dual Squelcher (front).
- Official art of an Inkling holding the Custom Dual Squelcher.
